publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7167 Angela Constance: Broxburn and Uphall War Memorial—That the Parliament records with pride the dedication ceremony held on Sunday 3 October 2010 to celebrate the new war memorial for the communities of Broxburn and Uphall; pays tribute to what it considers to be the hard work, commitment and vision of the Broxburn and Uphall War Memorial Group; applauds the work of the artist, Alan Beattie Herriot, who designed the statue and memorial, which was based on a drawing by Stephen McMahon of St Nicholas Primary School, and believes that this lasting memorial will provide a focal point for the Broxburn and Uphall communities to remember the generations of servicemen and women who have made the ultimate sacrifice for their people and their country.
S3M-7167 Broxburn and Uphall War Memorial (lodged on 6 October 2010) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-7167 Angela Constance: Broxburn and Uphall War Memorial—That the Parliament records with pride the dedication ceremony held on Sunday 3 October 2010 to celebrate the new war memorial for the communities of Broxburn and Uphall; pays tribute to what it considers to be the hard work, commitment and vision of the Broxburn and Uphall War Memorial Group; applauds the work of the artist, Alan Beattie Herriot, who designed the statue and memorial, which was based on a drawing by Stephen McMahon of St Nicholas Primary School, and believes that this lasting memorial will provide a focal point for the Broxburn and Uphall communities to remember the generations of servicemen and women who have made the ultimate sacrifice for their people and their country. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn
